00014 #include "funcsynth.h"
00015 #include "ui_funcsynthform.h"
00016 #include "interface.h"
00017 #include "analyzer.h"
00018 #include "xnodeconnector.h"
00019 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00020 #include <qstatusbar.h>

00022 
00023 XFuncSynth::XFuncSynth(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00024                        const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00025                        const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00026                        const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00027                        const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) : 
00028     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00029     m_output(create<XBoolNode>("Output", true)),
00030     m_trig(create<XNode>("Trigger", true)),
00031     m_mode(create<XComboNode>("Mode", false)),
00032     m_freq(create<XDoubleNode>("Freq", false)),
00033     m_function(create<XComboNode>("Function", false)),
00034     m_amp(create<XDoubleNode>("Amplitude", false)),
00035     m_phase(create<XDoubleNode>("Phase", false)),
00036     m_offset(create<XDoubleNode>("Offset", false)),
00037     m_form(new FrmFuncSynth(g_pFrmMain))
00038 {
00039     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00040     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("Func. Synth. - ") + getLabel() );
00041 
00042     m_conOutput = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_output, m_form->m_ckbOutput);
00043     m_conTrig = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_trig, m_form->m_btnTrig);
00044     m_conMode = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_mode, m_form->m_cmbMode);
00045     m_conFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freq, m_form->m_edFreq);
00046     m_conFunction = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_function, m_form->m_cmbFunc);
00047     m_conAmp = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_amp, m_form->m_edAmp);
00048     m_conPhase = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_phase, m_form->m_edPhase);
00049     m_conOffset = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_offset, m_form->m_edOffset);
00050 
00051     m_output->setUIEnabled(false);
00052     m_trig->setUIEnabled(false);
00053     m_mode->setUIEnabled(false);
00054     m_freq->setUIEnabled(false);
00055     m_function->setUIEnabled(false);
00056     m_amp->setUIEnabled(false);
00057     m_phase->setUIEnabled(false);
00058     m_offset->setUIEnabled(false);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void
00062 XFuncSynth::showForms() {
00063 //! impliment form->show() here
00064     m_form->show();
00065     m_form->raise();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void
00069 XFuncSynth::start()
00070 {
00071     m_output->setUIEnabled(true);
00072     m_trig->setUIEnabled(true);
00073     m_mode->setUIEnabled(true);
00074     m_freq->setUIEnabled(true);
00075     m_function->setUIEnabled(true);
00076     m_amp->setUIEnabled(true);
00077     m_phase->setUIEnabled(true);
00078     m_offset->setUIEnabled(true);
00079         
00080     m_lsnOutput = output()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00081         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onOutputChanged);
00082     m_lsnTrig = trig()->onTouch().connectWeak(
00083         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onTrigTouched);
00084     m_lsnMode = mode()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00085         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onModeChanged);
00086     m_lsnFreq = freq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00087         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onFreqChanged);
00088     m_lsnFunction = function()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00089         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onFunctionChanged);
00090     m_lsnAmp = amp()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00091         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onAmpChanged);
00092     m_lsnPhase = phase()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00093         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onPhaseChanged);
00094     m_lsnOffset = offset()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00095         shared_from_this(), &XFuncSynth::onOffsetChanged);
00096 }
00097 void
00098 XFuncSynth::stop()
00099 {  
00100     m_lsnOutput.reset();
00101     m_lsnTrig.reset();
00102     m_lsnMode.reset();
00103     m_lsnFreq.reset();
00104     m_lsnFunction.reset();
00105     m_lsnAmp.reset();
00106     m_lsnPhase.reset();
00107     m_lsnOffset.reset();
00108   
00109     m_output->setUIEnabled(false);
00110     m_trig->setUIEnabled(false);
00111     m_mode->setUIEnabled(false);
00112     m_freq->setUIEnabled(false);
00113     m_function->setUIEnabled(false);
00114     m_amp->setUIEnabled(false);
00115     m_phase->setUIEnabled(false);
00116     m_offset->setUIEnabled(false);
00117 
00118     afterStop();
00119 }
